### advanced_toolloop

>  advanced_toolloop (message, sp, tools, sh=None, model='gpt-4',
>                         base_url=None, max_steps=10, final_prompt=None,
>                         verbose=False)

\*Advanced tool loop for RLM that handles REPL code execution and
recursive LLM calls.

Args: message: User query to answer sp: System prompt for the root LLM
tools: List of tool functions (typically \[run_repl\]) sh: Shell
instance for FINAL_VAR variable lookup model: Model name base_url: API
base URL max_steps: Maximum iteration steps final_prompt: Prompt to add
if max_steps reached without FINAL Yields: LLM responses, tool results,
and final answer dict\*
